ðŸ“– Summary: PixiEditor is a versatile 2D graphics editor designed for a wide range of applications, including pixel art, painting, vector graphics, and animation. It features a node-based render system that allows for extensive customization and supports various export formats. The editor aims to provide an intuitive and familiar interface for all 2D editing needs.
